Body:
Description: Hi. We have a lot of devices that have the client installed but for some reason not available on the Server side when I search for them.

I have tried reinstalling the client but still not showing or its taking a very long time to connect.

What can / should I do?

Thank you

What We've Learned Updated: Removed the new client version 6.2.3.10 and installed the old version 5.5.1.6 on affected devices.
The affected devices came online immediately and connected to the Server. We could see them on the Server.
Upgraded from old client to new version on affected devices. The connection broke again. 
Upgraded from old client to new version on existing unaffected devices. The connection stayed and upgrade was successful.
Next Steps Updated: To schedule a remote session, but it is difficult because of the time difference.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Alin Anca, Nicolaas Coertze

What We've Learned Updated: Removed the new client version 6.2.3.10 and installed the old version 5.5.1.6 on affected devices.
The affected devices came online immediately and connected to the Server. We could see them on the Server.
Upgraded from old client to new version on affected devices. The connection broke again. 
Upgraded from old client to new version on existing unaffected devices. The connection stayed and upgrade was successful.


Connected to the computer, uninstalled the client 5.5.1.6 with the Box Remove database and Logs selected; restarted the computer; Installed the latest version 6.2.3.1 and it communicated.
